titles.title: To amend section 7(a) of the Small Business Act to provide assistance to motor vehicle dealers, and for other purposes.
To amend section 7(a) of the Small Business Act to provide assistance to motor vehicle dealers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Tax.

bill.summary: Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to provide loans to motor vehicle dealers for the purchase of inventory. Sets the maximum loan limit at $20 million.
